lines.text: [Tommy is immitating Marlon Brando from "On the Waterfront"]
I coulda been somebody, instead of just an ice cream truck driver, which is what I am, let's face it.
Who was that, Jerry Lewis?
Jerry Lewis? You thought that was Jerry Lewis?
If I win, I get to take you home. If you win, you can go home with me.
What kind of deal is that, huh? I don't know it doesn't make sense to me.
It's a good deal. It's a good deal for me!
He saved my life once.
What, he was gonna kill you but he changed his mind?
[about having another glass of whiskey]
You're a weak man.
Yeah, I know. That's why I drink it straight. The ice cubes are too heavy.
I know, but now I'm even worse. I don't know what I'm doing. I just, I, I just feel like... I don't know what I feel. I don't. I don't feel anything. Except lost.
Everybody's fucked up, but nobody wants anybody else to think they are, but everybody knows they are anyway.
Hey Bill, did - did you ever kill anybody?

[slurred drunkenly]
What kind of an asshole question is that?
I mean, in uh, Korea.
What "career?"
You don't go to work every day. You go to a bar every day.
He's a little old man. Can't you take some of the wrinkles out? You've given birth to Mr. Magoo.
No, Jerry is allright. Saved my life once.
What, he was gonna kill you but he changed his mind?
Can you help you?
Yeah, I was in here last week, I left my number. I was just wondering if you found a mechanic yet.
No, not yet.
Because I'm available, I mean I know you're probably still looking at other possibilities but I can start anytime.
I remember you. Where's your car?
My car?
Yeah, when you drove away from here last week your car stalled out down the block, it took you 25 minutes to get it started.
I know, it's a piece of shit. But I've got it running pretty good now.
So how come you're on foot?
Just felt like walking.
Billy, Stan got new glasses.
[to Stan]
Show him your glasses.
[to Bill]
He don't like 'em.
Get ready, Bill.
[puts glasses on]
You look like an idiot.
Go fuck, Billy!
